column4: Ugh, how do I rename a file? Is it sudo rename -v '/hda1/folder' '/hda1/newname'?
i only use rename for bulk renaming normally just 'mv file newfile'
sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid whatevername key whateverkey; sudo dhclient wlan0    <-- doesnt work? how about sudo ifconfig somestaticip
hmm, lemme try connecting directly like that.
